traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.desc: You are naturally resistant to both necrotic and radiant types of damage.

traits.name: Healing hands
traits.desc: By using a Magic action, you can touch a creature and roll a number of d4's equal to your Proficiency Bonus. The creature regains hit points equal to the total rolled. This ability can be used once per Long Rest.

traits.name: Light bearer
traits.desc: You know the Light cantrip, and you use Charisma as your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation.
traits.desc: Starting at 3rd level, you can use a Bonus Action to transform, choosing one of the following options each time. The transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it. Once used, you must finish a Long Rest before using it again. During the transformation, you can deal extra damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus once per turn, with the type depending on the option chosen. Heavenly Wings: Temporary spectral wings grant you a flying speed equal to your walking speed.Inner Radiance: Brilliant light shines from your eyes and mouth, illuminating a 10-foot radius brightly and another 10 ft dimly. At the end of each turn, creatures within 10 ft take radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.Necrotic Shroud: our eyes darken and shadowy wings appear. Nearby creatures (except allies) must make a Charisma saving throw or become frightened until your next turn.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.desc:
Your heritage traces back to a specific dragon. Select a dragon type from the Draconic Ancestors table; this choice determines your Breath Weapon, Damage Resistance, and appearance.
DragonDamage type
BlackAcid
BlueLightning
BrassFire
BronzeLightning
CopperAcid
GoldFire
GreenPoison
RedFire
SilverCold
WhiteCold

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.desc: You can use your action to unleash a breath attack, with the damage type based on your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Damage resistance
traits.desc: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your Draconic Ancestry.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Draconic Flight
traits.desc: At 5th level, you can use a Bonus Action to sprout spectral wings, granting you a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 10 minutes or until you dismiss them or become incapacitated. The wings reflect your Breath Weapon's energy. This can be used once per Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 120 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: You have resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the poisoned condition.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.desc: Your maximum hit points increase by 1, and increase by 1 again each time you gain a level.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.desc: As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense out to 60 ft for 10 minutes, provided you are on or touching stone. This can be used a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Elven Lineage
traits.desc: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. You can choose a lineage from the following Elven Lineages: Drow, High elf or Wood elf. You gain the level 1 trait of that lineage. On levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell that you always have prepared (see subspecies for more information). Once per long rest you can cast this spell without using a spell slot. After expending that use you can cast the spell using any spell slot you have available of the right level. Your spellcasting ability for the spells in this trait is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma

traits.name: Keen senses
traits.desc: You are proficient in one of the following skills: Insight, Perception or Survival

traits.name: Trance
traits.desc: You are unable to sleep. This causes sleep spells to not have effect on you at all. A long rest can be completed in 4 hours by doing a trancelike meditation. You stay concious during a long rest

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Gnomish lineage
traits.desc: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. You can choose a lineage from the following Gnomish Lineages: Forest Gnome or Rock Gnome (for more information, see subspecies)

traits.name: Giant Ancestry
traits.desc: You are part of a Giant lineage. Choose one of the following ancestries (supernatural boon from your anchestry):  Cloud Giant, Fire Giant, Frost Giant, Hill Giant, Stone Giant, Storm Giant. You can use this benefit an amount of times equal to your characters proficiency bonus.

traits.name: Large form
traits.desc: When reaching level 5, you can transform to your large form (size becomes large) for 10 minutes. While in large form, your speed increases by 5ft and you have advantage on Strength checks. You can only do this once per long rest.

traits.name: Strong Build
traits.desc: When trying to end the Grappled condition, you have advantage on any ability check you make to do so.

traits.name: Luck
traits.desc: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Naturally stealthy
traits.desc: You can take the hide action, even if you're only hidden by a creature one size larger than you

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.desc: Long rests make you happy. you gain Heroic Inspiration

traits.name: Skilled
traits.desc: You are proficient in one skill of your choice

traits.name: Versatile
traits.desc: you gain one feat from the Origin feats

traits.name: Adreline rush
traits.desc: As a bonus action, you can take the dash action on your turn. You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus. You can use this a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus and you regain expended uses after a Short Rest or Long Rest

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.desc: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but haven't been fully killed, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. You can use this trait once per Long Rest

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 120 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You are able to see clearly in dim light up to 60 ft as if it were bright, and in total darkness as if it were dim. However, you can only see shades of gray in darkness, not colors.

traits.name: Fiendish legacy
traits.desc: You are part of a Legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. You can choose one of the following legacies: Abyssal, Chthonic or Inferno (see subspecies for more information)

traits.name: Otherworldly precense
traits.desc: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip

subspecies.name: Drow
subspecies.desc: You are part of the Elven Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: Your darkvision range becomes 120ft and you learn the Dancing Lights cantrip

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the Faerie Fire spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Darkness spell

subspecies.name: High Elf
subspecies.desc: You are part of the Elven Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: You learn the Prestidigitation cantrip. Once per long rest you can replace this cantrip with one from the Wizard spell list

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the Detect Magic spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Misty Step spell

subspecies.name: Wood Elf
subspecies.desc: You are part of the Elven Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: Your speed becomes 35ft and you learn the Druidcraft cantrip

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the Longstrider spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Pass without trace spell

subspecies.name: Forest Gnome
subspecies.desc: You are part of the Gnome Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Minor Illusion
traits.desc: You learn the Minor Illusion cantrip

traits.name: Speak with animals
traits.desc: You learn the Speak with animals spell, which you can use without wasting a spell slot the amount of times equal to your proficiency bonus

subspecies.name: Rock Gnome
subspecies.desc: You are part of the Gnome Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Little Tinkerer
traits.desc: You learn the Prestidigitation and Mending cantrips. You can use the Prestidigitation cantrip to make a little device (5 AC, 1hp) which can have one effect from Prestidigitation. Take a bonus action to activate the effect. The devices fall apart after 8 hours or when you take a utilize action, and you can have max 3 of them at a time.

subspecies.name: Cloud Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Cloud's Jaunt
traits.desc: You can us a bonus action to magically teleport to any unoccupied area you can see within 30ft of you.

subspecies.name: Fire Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Fire's Burn
traits.desc: When you hit a target with an attack roll you can do your attack's damage + 1d10 fire damage

subspecies.name: Frost Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Frost's chill
traits.desc: When you hit a target with an attack roll you can do your attack's damage + 1d6 Cold damage. The target's speed also reduces to 10ft until the start of your next turn

subspecies.name: Hill Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Hill's Tumble
traits.desc: When you target a Large or Small creature and deal damage, you can give the target the Prone condition

subspecies.name: Stone Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Stone's Endurance
traits.desc: When you take any damage, you can make a 1d12 reaction roll. Reduce the dealt damage by the number you rolled + your CON modifier

subspecies.name: Storm Giant
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Giant Lineage that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Storm's Thunder
traits.desc: When you take any damage from a creature within 60 ft of you, you can make a 1d8 reaction roll to deal the rolled number of thunder damage to that creature

subspecies.name: Abyssal
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: You are resistent to poison damage. You learn the Poison Spray cantrip

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the Ray of Sickness spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Hold Person spell

subspecies.name: Chthonic
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: You are resistent to Necrotic damage. You learn the Chill Touch cantrip

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the False Life spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Ray of Enfeeblement spell

subspecies.name: Inferno
subspecies.desc: You are part of a Legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

traits.name: Level 1
traits.desc: You are resistent to Fire damage. You learn the Fire Bolt cantrip

traits.name: Level 3
traits.desc: You learn the Hellish Rebuke spell

traits.name: Level 5
traits.desc: You learn the Darkness spell
